title: Roles | Members
description:
Various primary roles which belong to the members of the community.

• <@&810500594048958494> - The Eternal Raiden Shogun.

• <@&801133647485730896> - Server Admins.

• <@&811959425824587826> - Server Moderators.

• <@&803652074024730646> - Beloved Nitro Boosters.

• <@&818945476673142855> - Trusted members of the community.

• <@&801371184645931009> - Original 250 Members.

• <@&807112576210305085> - All Members.

title: Roles | Special
description:
Special roles belonging to the members of the community that have contributed greatly to the server with their talents, efforts and dedication.

• <@&811215570476466197> - Approved translators who have worked hard to provide many leaks and news.

• <@&806920564554858496> - Approved leak compilers and providers

• <@&813411660391776357> - Divine servants in charge of maintaining and moderating Raiden Mei channels.

• <@&822098072174854244> - Honkai addicts in charge of providing announcements for Honkai Impact.

• <@&822812384845496341> - Approved emote artists who have created many lovely emotes for the server.
